archimate:Requirement.name: MA-6(3): Timely Maintenance | Automated Support for Predictive Maintenance
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Transfer predictive maintenance data to a maintenance management system using [Assignment: organization-defined automated mechanisms].

properties.value: A computerized maintenance management system maintains a database of information about the maintenance operations of organizations and automates the processing of equipment condition data to trigger maintenance planning, execution, and reporting.
